C

captureAlarm(AlarmEvent) - Method in interface clock.IAlarmListener
The method is called when an alarm event occurs.
clock - package clock
 
ClockBean - Class in clock
ClockBean is a JavaBean component that displays the current time as a JLabel and includes features such as 24-hour/12-hour format switching and alarm functionality.
ClockBean() - Constructor for class clock.ClockBean
Constructor that initializes the ClockBean with default settings and starts the timer for updating the clock display.
